name: Spirit Forces
description:
The game follows a mysterious person that wanders through the dark dungeon in hopes for saving the prisoned light spirit.

With the help of light spirits; they grant you magical powers to defeat the dark spirit, make your way through the dungeon  and uncover the reason of the imprisonment.

=======Controls=======

A/D - Movements
Space - Jump

=====Credits======

BGM: N.91 Music
